english.segment1: Remember me. In a Bible cracked and faded by the years. Remember me. In a santuary filled with silent prayers
english.segment2: CHORUS: And age to age. And heart to heart. Bound by grace and peace. Child of wonder, Child of God. I'll remember you. Remember Me
english.segment3: Remember me. When the color of the sunset fills the sky. Remember me. When you pray and the tears of joy. fall from your eyes
english.segment5: Remember me. When the children leave. their Sunday school with smiles. Remember me. When they're old enough to teach. Old enough to preach. Old enough to leave
